string-array.name: characters_suggestions
string-array.item: Rick Sanchez:The eccentric and brilliant scientist is the main character
Morty Smith:Rick\'s timid and easily influenced grandson
Summer Smith:Morty\'s older sister and Rick\'s granddaughter
Beth Smith:Rick\'s daughter and Morty and Summer\'s mother.
Jerry Smith:Morty and Summer\'s father and Beth\'s husband
